traits.name: Punch
traits.desc: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4-1) bludgeon damage.

traits.name: Grab
traits.desc: reach 5 ft., one target. The target must succeed on a DC 8 versus Strength saving throw or be grabbed by the Brawler Goon and grant advantage on the next melee attack made against them.
